ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Finally! - Congrats!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Slyde. Occlusion here I come :) ... Hey Tzeetch - I was talking to Sebasstian last night (he got his epic) and his guild (Death Knights) and Shards of
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Slyde. Occlusion here I come :)

--- Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...> wrote:

Hey Tzeetch - I was talking to Sebasstian last night (he got his epic) and
his guild (Death Knights) and Shards of Avalon did Gorenaire. He said it
wasn't too hard as long as you had enough (he said 15+) 55+ fire nukers.

If you get good enough debuffers - even Druids can help against Gore.

Slyde

-----Original Message-----<BR>
From: John Grady [mailto:john_grady@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2001 12:41 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Finally! - Congrats!!

Congrats!

Man, what a commitment. I'm just starting the quest, so not much help with
the instrument question. But glad to see another Bard epic on Xegony.

One question for you though, did you get the scales from Naggy and Vox?
I'm really tired of waiting for those raids (most of my guild is above or
below the caps) but I hear the alternates like Gore are near impossible.
I'm kissing 52 and just want to keep trucking to 55 without worrying about
the darn scales!

Tzeetch
The Commune, Xegony

--- Rebecca Small wrote:

I'm finally done with my epic! I knew it would be soon as the Maestro
finally dropped a 7 string when we were in Hate last Saturday. That meant
of course I would soon finish the epic and not need the lute. I do have a
question that I have not seen a clear answer on: is the epic as powerful
as all our best instruments or stronger in string, lesser in percussion?
I'm just trying to figure out what instruments I don't need to carry
around
anymore.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
